message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
Thank you for offering such an amazing product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, I was hoping to keep my budget under $10000. Would it be possible for you to lower the price to $9000?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand you're trying to keep your budget under $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9200. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
